MajorClaims.Text: choosing the job that is similar to parents' jobs could benefit to one's career
parents can lead their children to a more smooth career path

Claims.Text: one can get more support from his or her parents if they are in the same industry
they could thus support much more to their children, such as domain knowledge and industry-related information
They have a deep insight in it and could provide much support to their children
choosing a job similar to one's parents' is not always a correct decision
